name: Future Mouse
description:
Mouse Land has been taken over by evil felines!

It's up to you to save the Future of Mouse Land!

Collect enough precious cheese and reach the goal.

Use Z to shoot your Laser Eye Beam.

Avoid touching the evil felines.

Art based on Lab Rat Labyrinth:
https://opengameart.org/content/lab-rat-labyrinth

Source:
https://github.com/yariplus/future_mouse
